items.text_for_match: 'Our relationship has changed' - Nuno on Forest owner weeks before sacking Speaking in August, Nottingham Forest manager Nuno Espirito Santo says his relationship with the club's owner Evangelos Marinakis has "changed". Speaking in August, Nottingham Forest manager Nuno Espirito Santo says his relationship with the club's owner Evangelos Marinakis has "changed".

items.ja: The wonderkids who didn't make it
items.en: The wonderkids who didn't make it
items.text_for_match: The wonderkids who didn't make it The Premier League has a history of young players making it big - which has continued this season - but not every starlet has followed up their bright start. The Premier League has a history of young players making it big - which has continued this season - but not every starlet has followed up their bright start.

items.ja: From chaos to professionalism - but is La Liga being left behind?
items.en: From chaos to professionalism - but is La Liga being left behind?
items.text_for_match: From chaos to professionalism - but is La Liga being left behind? BBC Sport's Guillem Balague looks at the strategic shift that has seen La Liga clubs spend much less than their counterparts in other leagues. BBC Sport's Guillem Balague looks at the strategic shift that has seen La Liga clubs spend much less than their counterparts in other leagues.

items.ja: PSG's Luis Enrique to have surgery after cycling accident
items.en: PSG's Luis Enrique to have surgery after cycling accident
items.text_for_match: PSG's Luis Enrique to have surgery after cycling accident Paris St-Germain head coach Luis Enrique will have surgery after being involved in a cycling accident on Friday. Paris St-Germain head coach Luis Enrique will have surgery after being involved in a cycling accident on Friday.

items.en: Has Messi retired from international football?
items.text_for_match: Has Messi retired from international football? BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team take a look at whether Lionel Messi will retire from international football. BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team take a look at whether Lionel Messi will retire from international football.
